attributes.action: Create legislation specific to assaults where the victims head is "stomped" on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Further to a recent assault in Aldershot where the victim's head was "stomped" upon, rendering him unconscious and, temporarily, on a life support machine and now brain damaged, we respectfully request specific legislation to dispose of this type of assault which is far too prevalent in today’s GB. 

There can never be an excuse for this type of assault and we would like to see it considered a specific category of crime.
